please pick a sdcard to grant write permission.
Use built-in manager to open PDFs
Use system manager to open PDFs
Create a desktop icon for the reader
I want to try the browser......
The main body of this APP is a web browser, but it has not yet been completed. The completed function is the PDF reading/annotating part.
Note: If you use the system file manager to call PolymPic to invoke the PDF document, you can use it without storage permission.
